values: i have too many bad memories and stuff in this one now. a lot of stuff has happened, and a lot of the things i felt in here just remind of something else. it's a new time in my life and i'm starting over. so a new journal. one i'll actually do. add me only if you'll actually read and comment. but i hope you all do. i'll probably be adding some of you that i can think of off the top of my head. but yeah. so that's the end of seriouslove. almost made it a year. i'll miss you. but hey, even better things in the future, right? can't imagine it now, but there will have to be.

This journal is...

FRIENDS ONLY.
Please list me first, comment, & I'll most likely add you back.
